name: Tattooed Chef, Inc.
description: Tattooed Chef, Inc. is a leading plant-based food company that specializes in innovative and convenient frozen food products. Founded in 2017, the company has rapidly established itself as a pioneer in the plant-based market, catering to the growing demand for healthy, delicious, and sustainable food options. Tattooed Chef offers a wide range of products, including cauliflower crust pizzas, plant-based bowls, and ready-to-cook meals that highlight the versatility of vegetables and plant ingredients. The brand is committed to sustainability, sourcing its ingredients responsibly and focusing on environmentally friendly practices throughout its production processes. Tattooed Chef aims to make plant-based eating accessible and enjoyable for everyone, providing options that are not only nutritious but also flavorful. The company is dedicated to innovation and continuously expanding its product lines to meet consumer preferences and dietary trends. With a strong presence in retail and e-commerce, Tattooed Chef is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing trend towards plant-based diets and healthy eating.

seo.meta_title: Tattooed Chef, Inc. | Innovative Plant-Based Foods
seo.meta_description: Explore Tattooed Chef, Inc., a leader in plant-based food innovation. Discover their wide range of delicious frozen and ready-to-cook meals.

faq.question: What products does Tattooed Chef offer?
faq.answer: Tattooed Chef offers a variety of frozen and ready-to-cook meals, including cauliflower crust pizzas and plant-based bowls.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Tattooed Chef?
faq.answer: Sam Galletti is the CEO of Tattooed Chef, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Tattooed Chef headquartered?
faq.answer: Tattooed Chef is headquartered in Paramount, California, USA.

faq.question: What is Tattooed Chef's mission?
faq.answer: Tattooed Chef aims to provide delicious and convenient plant-based food options while promoting sustainability.
